meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6549.

td.p: Stephanie Jass, a history professor from Milan, Michigan
Colby Burnett, a high school world history teacher from Chicago, Illinois
Dan McShane, a bartender from West Islip, New York

tr.td: THE WIT OF OSCAR WILDE
ORGANIZATIONS
HEAVY METAL HEROES
"B" NICE
NAMES IN AMERICAN LORE
THE YEAR THAT WAS
(Alex: And in that category you must take the clues in order from top to bottom.)
